listitem.para: Fixed Status bar not showing correct message in non-latin character sets.
Fixed Context Query not always save correctly when using translations.
Fixed changing of queries that was not detected when editing existing document.
Fixed resizing a section that was not detected as a change.
Fixed Line items that are hard to grab.
Added warning message at save when detail section does not have query selected.
Removed debug message about unknown element grid when previewing in openrpt.
Fixed Line items that don't always change section correctly.
Fixed newly created line items that were not displayed.
Fixed Snap To Grid that was not working consistently.
Fixed Items that don't change section correctly when they are moved using their resizing handles.
